44 //==============================================================================
45 
46 Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics(
47  const string& species_descriptor,
48  const string& thermo_db,
49  const string& state_model )
50  : mp_work1(NULL), mp_work2(NULL), mp_wrkcp(NULL), mp_default_composition(NULL),
51  m_has_electrons(false), m_natoms(0), m_nmolecules(0)
52 {
53  try {
54  // Load the thermodynamic database
55  mp_thermodb = Config::Factory<ThermoDB>::create(thermo_db, 0);
56  } catch (Error& e) {
57  e << "\nWas trying to load the thermodynamic database.";
58  throw;
59  }
60  if (!mp_thermodb->load(species_descriptor)) {
61  throw InvalidInputError("species list", species_descriptor)
62  << "Could not find all required species in the thermodynamic "
63  << "database.";
64  }
65 
66  // Store the species and element order information for easy access
67  for (int i = 0; i < nElements(); ++i)
68  m_element_indices[element(i).name()] = i;
69 
70  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i) {
71  m_species_indices[species(i).name()] = i;
72  m_natoms += (species(i).type() == ATOM ? 1 : 0);
73  m_nmolecules += (species(i).type() == MOLECULE ? 1 : 0);
74  }
75 
76  m_has_electrons = (species(0).type() == ELECTRON);
77 
78  m_ngas = 0;
79  for (int i = nSpecies()-1; (i > -1 && species(i).phase() != GAS); --i)
80  m_ngas++;
81  m_ngas = nSpecies()-m_ngas;
82 
83  // Build the composition matrix
84  m_element_matrix.resize(nSpecies(), nElements());
85 
86  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
87  for (int j = 0; j < nElements(); ++j)
88  m_element_matrix(i,j) =
89  species(i).nAtoms(element(j).name());
90 
91  // Store the species molecular weights for faster access
92  m_species_mw.resize(nSpecies());
93  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
94  m_species_mw(i) = species(i).molecularWeight();
95 
96  // Default composition (every element has equal parts)
97  mp_default_composition = new double [nElements()];
98  std::fill(
99  mp_default_composition, mp_default_composition + nElements(),
100  1.0 / nElements());
101 
102  // Allocate a new equilibrium solver
103  mp_equil = new MultiPhaseEquilSolver(*this);
104 
105  try {
106  // Allocate a new state model
107  mp_state = Config::Factory<StateModel>::create(state_model, *this);
108  } catch (Error& e) {
109  // Can't save this, fail gracefully
110  delete mp_thermodb;
111  delete mp_default_composition;
112  delete mp_equil;
113 
114  // Add a bit more info to the error message
115  e << "\nWas trying to load the requested state model.";
116  throw;
117  }
118 
119  // Allocate storage for the work array
120  mp_work1 = new double [nSpecies()];
121  mp_work2 = new double [nSpecies()];
122  mp_wrkcp = new double [nSpecies()*nEnergyEqns()];
123  mp_y = new double [nSpecies()];
124 }
125 
126 //==============================================================================
127 
128 Thermodynamics::~Thermodynamics()
129 {
130  delete [] mp_work1;
131  delete [] mp_work2;
132  delete [] mp_wrkcp;
133  delete [] mp_default_composition;
134  delete [] mp_y;
135 
136  delete mp_thermodb;
137  delete mp_equil;
138  delete mp_state;
139 }

143 void Thermodynamics::setDefaultComposition(const Composition& c)
144 {
145  c.getComposition(m_element_indices, mp_default_composition);
146  if (c.type() == Composition::MASS)
147  convert<YE_TO_XE>(mp_default_composition, mp_default_composition);
148 }
149 
150 void Thermodynamics::setDefaultComposition(const double* const p_vec)
151 {
152  std::copy(p_vec, p_vec + nElements(), mp_default_composition);
153 }

293 //==============================================================================

295 double Thermodynamics::mixtureMw() const
296 {
297  //return dot(Numerics::asVector(mp_state->X(), nSpecies()), m_species_mw);
298  return (Map<const ArrayXd>(mp_state->X(), nSpecies())*m_species_mw).sum();
299 }

360 //==============================================================================
361 
362 double Thermodynamics::numberDensity(const double T, const double P) const
363 {
364  return P / (KB * T);
365 }
366 
367 //==============================================================================
368 
369 double Thermodynamics::numberDensity() const
370 {
371  double Xe = (hasElectrons() ? mp_state->X()[0] : 0.0);
372  double Th = mp_state->T();
373  double Te = mp_state->Te();
374  double P = mp_state->P();
375  return P / (KB * (Th + Xe*(Te - Th)));
376 }
377 
378 //==============================================================================
379 
380 double Thermodynamics::pressure(
381  const double T, const double rho, const double *const Y) const
382 {
383  double pressure = 0.0;
384  for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
385  pressure += Y[i] / speciesMw(i);
386  pressure *= rho * T * RU;
387  return pressure;
388 }
389 
390 //==============================================================================
391 
392 double Thermodynamics::density(
393  const double T, const double P, const double *const X) const
394 {
395  double density = 0.0;
396  for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
397  density += X[i] * speciesMw(i);
398  density *= P / (RU * T);
399  return density;
400 }
401 
402 //==============================================================================
403 
404 double Thermodynamics::density() const
405 {
406  return numberDensity() * mixtureMw() / NA;
407  //return density(mp_state->T(), mp_state->P(), mp_state->X());
408 }
409 
410 //==============================================================================
411 
412 void Thermodynamics::densities(double* const p_rho) const
413 {
414  double rho = density();
415  for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
416  p_rho[i] = rho * Y()[i];
417 }

419 //==============================================================================
420 
421 void Thermodynamics::speciesCpOverR(double *const p_cp) const
422 {
423  // WARNING: The total cp only makes sense at thermal equilibirum
424  mp_thermodb->cp(
425  mp_state->T(), mp_state->T(), mp_state->T(), mp_state->T(),
426  mp_state->T(), p_cp, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
427 }
428 
429 //==============================================================================
430 
431 void Thermodynamics::speciesCpOverR(double T, double* const p_cp) const
432 {
433  mp_thermodb->cp(
434  T, T, T, T, T, p_cp, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
435 }
436 
437 //==============================================================================
438 
439 void Thermodynamics::speciesCpOverR(
440  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel, double *const p_cp,
441  double *const p_cpt, double *const p_cpr, double *const p_cpv,
442  double *const p_cpel) const
443 {
444  mp_thermodb->cp(
445  Th, Te, Tr, Tv, Tel, p_cp, p_cpt, p_cpr, p_cpv, p_cpel);
446 }
447 
448 //==============================================================================
449 
450 void Thermodynamics::speciesCvOverR(
451  double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel, double *const p_cv,
452  double *const p_cvt, double *const p_cvr, double *const p_cvv,
453  double *const p_cvel) const
454 {
455  mp_thermodb->cp(Th, Te, Tr, Tv, Tel, p_cv, p_cvt, p_cvr, p_cvv, p_cvel);
456 
457  // WARNING: the total cv only makes sense at thermal equilibrium
458  if (p_cv != NULL) {
459  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
460  p_cv[i] -= 1.0;
461  }
462 
463  if (p_cvt != NULL) {
464  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
465  p_cvt[i] -= 1.0;
466  }
467 
468 }

472 double Thermodynamics::mixtureFrozenCpMole() const
473 {
474  return mixtureFrozenCpMass() * mixtureMw();
475 // double cp = 0.0;
476 // speciesCpOverR(mp_work1);
477 // for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
478 // cp += mp_work1[i] * X()[i];
479 // return (cp * RU);
480 }

482 //==============================================================================
483 
484 double Thermodynamics::mixtureFrozenCpMass() const
485 {
486  double cp = 0.0;
487  getCpsMass(mp_wrkcp);
488  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
489  cp += mp_wrkcp[i] * Y()[i];
490  return cp;
491 // return mixtureFrozenCpMole() / mixtureMw();
492 }
493 
494 //==============================================================================
495 
496 double Thermodynamics::mixtureEquilibriumCpMole()
497 {
498  if (nSpecies() == 1)
499  return mixtureFrozenCpMole();
500 
501  const double T = this->T();
502 
503  // Compute species enthalpies and dg/dT
504  speciesHOverRT(mp_work1);
505  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j)
506  mp_work2[j] = -mp_work1[j] / T;
507 
508  // Compute change in species moles due to change in temperature
509  mp_equil->dNdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
510 
511  // Now compute the sums which require dN/dT
512  double sum1 = 0.0, sum2 = 0.0;
513  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j) {
514  sum1 += mp_work2[j]; // sum_j dN_j/dT
515  sum2 += mp_work2[j]*mp_work1[j]; // sum_j dN_j/dT*H_j/RT
516  }
517 
518  // Compute the species moles vector from the equilibrium solver
519  mp_equil->speciesMoles(mp_work2);
520 
521  // Compute the sums that require N and H
522  double sum3 = 0.0, sum4 = 0.0;
523  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j) {
524  sum3 += mp_work2[j]; // sum_j N_j
525  sum4 += mp_work2[j]*mp_work1[j]; // sum_j N_j*H_j/RT
526  }
527 
528  // Compute the Cp vector
529  speciesCpOverR(mp_work1);
530  double sum5 = 0.0;
531  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j)
532  sum5 += mp_work2[j]*mp_work1[j]; // sum_j N_j*Cp_j/R
533 
534  // Put together all the terms
535  return RU*(sum3*(sum5+T*sum2)-T*sum1*sum4)/(sum3*sum3);
536 }
537 
538 //==============================================================================
539 
540 double Thermodynamics::mixtureEquilibriumCpMass()
541 {
542  if (nSpecies() == 1)
543  return mixtureFrozenCpMass();
544 
545  const double T = this->T();
546 
547  // Compute species enthalpies and dg/dT
548  speciesHOverRT(mp_work1);
549  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j)
550  mp_work2[j] = -mp_work1[j] / T;
551 
552  // Compute change in species moles due to change in temperature
553  mp_equil->dNdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
554 
555  // Now compute the sums which require dN/dT
556  double sum1 = 0.0, sum2 = 0.0;
557  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j) {
558  sum1 += mp_work2[j]*speciesMw(j); // sum_j dN_j/dT*Mw_j
559  sum2 += mp_work2[j]*mp_work1[j]; // sum_j dN_j/dT*H_j/RT
560  }
561 
562  // Compute the species moles vector from the equilibrium solver
563  mp_equil->speciesMoles(mp_work2);
564 
565  // Compute the sums that require N and H
566  double sum3 = 0.0, sum4 = 0.0;
567  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j) {
568  sum3 += mp_work2[j]*speciesMw(j); // sum_j N_j
569  sum4 += mp_work2[j]*mp_work1[j]; // sum_j N_j*H_j/RT
570  }
571 
572  // Compute the Cp vector
573  speciesCpOverR(mp_work1);
574  double sum5 = 0.0;
575  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j)
576  sum5 += mp_work2[j]*mp_work1[j]; // sum_j N_j*Cp_j/R
577 
578  // Put together all the terms
579  return RU*(sum3*(sum5+T*sum2)-T*sum1*sum4)/(sum3*sum3);
580 }
581 
582 //==============================================================================
583 
584 void Thermodynamics::dXidT(double* const p_dxdt) const
585 {
586  const double T = this->T();
587 
588  // Compute species enthalpies and dg/dT
589  speciesHOverRT(p_dxdt);
590  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j)
591  p_dxdt[j] = -p_dxdt[j] / T;
592 
593  mp_equil->dXdg(p_dxdt, p_dxdt);
594 }
595 
596 void Thermodynamics::dXidP(double* const p_dxdp) const
597 {
598  const double P = this->P();
599  for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
600  p_dxdp[i] = 1.0/P;
601  for (int i = nGas(); i < nSpecies(); ++i)
602  p_dxdp[i] = 0.0;
603  mp_equil->dXdg(p_dxdp, p_dxdp);
604 }
605 
606 void Thermodynamics::dXjdci(int i, double* const p_dxdc) const
607 {
608  mp_equil->dXdc(i, p_dxdc);
609 }
610 
611 //==============================================================================
612 
613 double Thermodynamics::dRhodP()
614 {
615  // Get rho, P, T
616  const double rho = density();
617  const double P = this->P();
618  const double Mwmix = mixtureMw();
619 
620  // Compute dX/dP (work2)
621  for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
622  mp_work2[i] = 1.0/P;
623  for (int i = nGas(); i < nSpecies(); ++i)
624  mp_work2[i] = 0.0;
625  mp_equil->dXdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
626 
627  // Compute dMw/dT
628  double dMwdP = 0.0;
629  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
630  dMwdP += mp_work2[i] * speciesMw(i);
631 
632  return (rho*(dMwdP/Mwmix+1.0/P));
633 }
634 
635 //==============================================================================
636 
637 double Thermodynamics::mixtureFrozenCvMole() const
638 {
639  return mixtureFrozenCvMass() * mixtureMw();
640  //return mixtureFrozenCpMole() - RU; // Wrong in the T-Tv case !!!
641 }
642 
643 //==============================================================================
644 
645 double Thermodynamics::mixtureFrozenCvMass() const
646 {
647  double cv = 0.0;
648  getCvsMass(mp_wrkcp);
649  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
650  cv += mp_wrkcp[i] * Y()[i];
651  return cv;
652  //return (mixtureFrozenCpMole() - RU) / mixtureMw(); // Wrong in the T-Tv case !!!
653 }
654 
655 //==============================================================================
656 
657 double Thermodynamics::mixtureEquilibriumCvMass()
658 {
659  // Get rho, P, T
660  const double rho = density();
661  const double P = this->P();
662  const double T = this->T();
663  const double Mwmix = mixtureMw();
664  const double* const p_X = X();
665 
666  // Compute h/RT
667  speciesHOverRT(mp_work1);
668 
669  // Compute dX/dT
670  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j)
671  mp_work2[j] = -mp_work1[j] / T;
672  mp_equil->dXdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
673 
674  // Compute dMw/dT
675  double dMwdT = 0.0;
676  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
677  dMwdT += mp_work2[i] * speciesMw(i);
678 
679  // Compute reactive Cp
680  double cp = 0.0;
681  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
682  cp += mp_work1[i] * (mp_work2[i]*Mwmix - p_X[i]*dMwdT);
683  cp *= (T / Mwmix);
684 
685  // Add Frozen Cp
686  speciesCpOverR(mp_work2);
687  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
688  cp += mp_work2[i] * p_X[i];
689  cp *= RU / Mwmix;
690 
691  // Compute dX/dP (work2)
692  for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
693  mp_work2[i] = 1.0/P;
694  for (int i = nGas(); i < nSpecies(); ++i)
695  mp_work2[i] = 0.0;
696  mp_equil->dXdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
697 
698  // Compute dMw/dP
699  double dMwdP = 0.0;
700  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
701  dMwdP += mp_work2[i] * speciesMw(i);
702 
703  // Compute de/dP
704  double dedp = 0.0;
705  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); i++)
706  dedp += (mp_work1[i] - 1.0) * (mp_work2[i]*Mwmix - p_X[i]*dMwdP);
707  dedp *= (RU * T / (Mwmix*Mwmix));
708 
709  // Compute density and energy derivatives
710  const double drdt = dMwdT/Mwmix - 1.0/T; // note we leave out rho*(...)
711  const double drdp = dMwdP/Mwmix + 1.0/P; // here also
712 
713  return (cp + (P/rho - dedp/drdp)*drdt);
714 }
715 
716 //==============================================================================
717 
718 void Thermodynamics::sumSpeciesMass(
719  const double* const p_s, double* const p_e, const int size) const
720 {
721  const int ns = nSpecies();
722 
723  Map<VectorXd>(p_e, size) =
724  Map<const Matrix<double, -1, -1, RowMajor> >(p_s, size, ns) *
725  Map<const VectorXd>(mp_y, ns);
726 }
727 
728 //==============================================================================
729 
730 void Thermodynamics::mixtureEnergies(double* const p_e)
731 {
732  // Compute the species energies
733  mp_state->getEnergiesMass(mp_wrkcp);
734  sumSpeciesMass(mp_wrkcp, p_e, nEnergyEqns());
735 }

739 
740 /*double Thermodynamics::mixtureEquilibriumCvMass()
741 {

744  // drho/T and drho/P
745

756

758  dP = 1.0e-3*P;//std::sqrt(NumConst<double>::eps)*P;
759  equilibrate(T, P+dP, mp_work2, mp_work1);
760  rhoP = density();
761  eP = mixtureEnergyMass();
762

764  dT = std::sqrt(NumConst<double>::eps)*T;
765  equilibrate(T+dT, P, mp_work2, mp_work1);

772  drhodp = (rhoP-rho)/dP;
773  dedt = (eT-e)/dT;
774  dedp = (eP-e)/dP;

781  //cout << drhodt << " " << drhodp << " " << dedt << " " << dedp << endl;

783  // Compute Cv
784  return (dedt - dedp*drhodt/drhodp);

786 
787 //==============================================================================
788 
789 double Thermodynamics::mixtureFrozenGamma() const
790 {
791  double cp = mixtureFrozenCpMole();
792  double cv = mixtureFrozenCvMole();
793  return (cp / cv);
794  //return (cp / (cp - RU));
795 }
796 
797 //==============================================================================
798 
799 double Thermodynamics::mixtureEquilibriumGamma()
800 {
801  // Get rho, P, T
802  const double rho = density();
803  const double P = this->P();
804  const double T = this->T();
805  const double Mwmix = mixtureMw();
806  const double* const p_X = X();
807 
808  speciesHOverRT(mp_work1);
809  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j)
810  mp_work2[j] = -mp_work1[j] / T;
811 
812  mp_equil->dXdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
813 
814  // Compute dMw/dT
815  double dMwdT = 0.0;
816  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
817  dMwdT += mp_work2[i] * speciesMw(i);
818 
819  // Compute reactive Cp
820  double cp = 0.0;
821  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
822  cp += mp_work1[i] * (mp_work2[i]*Mwmix - p_X[i]*dMwdT);
823  cp *= (T / Mwmix);
824 
825  // Add Frozen Cp
826  speciesCpOverR(mp_work2);
827  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
828  cp += mp_work2[i] * p_X[i];
829  cp *= RU / Mwmix;
830 
831  // Compute dX/dP (work2)
832  for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
833  mp_work2[i] = 1.0/P;
834  for (int i = nGas(); i < nSpecies(); ++i)
835  mp_work2[i] = 0.0;
836  mp_equil->dXdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
837 
838  // Compute dMw/dP
839  double dMwdP = 0.0;
840  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
841  dMwdP += mp_work2[i] * speciesMw(i);
842 
843  // Compute de/dP
844  double dedp = 0.0;
845  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); i++)
846  dedp += (mp_work1[i] - 1.0) * (mp_work2[i]*Mwmix - p_X[i]*dMwdP);
847  dedp *= (RU * T / (Mwmix*Mwmix));
848 
849  // Compute density and energy derivatives
850  const double drdt = dMwdT/Mwmix - 1.0/T; // note we leave out rho*(...)
851  const double drdp = dMwdP/Mwmix + 1.0/P; // here also
852 
853  //return (dedt - dedp*drdt/drdp);
854  return cp / (cp + (P/rho - dedp/drdp)*drdt);
855 }
856 
857 //==============================================================================
858 
859 double Thermodynamics::equilibriumSoundSpeed()
860 {
861  // Get rho, P, T
862  const double rho = density();
863  const double P = this->P();
864  const double T = this->T();
865  const double Mwmix = mixtureMw();
866  const double* const p_X = X();
867 
868  speciesHOverRT(mp_work1);
869  for (int j = 0; j < nSpecies(); ++j)
870  mp_work2[j] = -mp_work1[j] / T;
871 
872  mp_equil->dXdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
873 
874  // Compute dMw/dT
875  double dMwdT = 0.0;
876  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
877  dMwdT += mp_work2[i] * speciesMw(i);
878 
879  // Compute reactive Cp
880  double cp = 0.0;
881  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
882  cp += mp_work1[i] * (mp_work2[i]*Mwmix - p_X[i]*dMwdT);
883  cp *= (T / Mwmix);
884 
885  // Add Frozen Cp
886  speciesCpOverR(mp_work2);
887  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
888  cp += mp_work2[i] * p_X[i];
889  cp *= RU / Mwmix;
890 
891  // Compute dX/dP (work2)
892  for (int i = 0; i < nGas(); ++i)
893  mp_work2[i] = 1.0/P;
894  for (int i = nGas(); i < nSpecies(); ++i)
895  mp_work2[i] = 0.0;
896  mp_equil->dXdg(mp_work2, mp_work2);
897 
898  // Compute dMw/dP
899  double dMwdP = 0.0;
900  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
901  dMwdP += mp_work2[i] * speciesMw(i);
902 
903  // Compute de/dP
904  double dedp = 0.0;
905  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); i++)
906  dedp += (mp_work1[i] - 1.0) * (mp_work2[i]*Mwmix - p_X[i]*dMwdP);
907  dedp *= (RU * T / (Mwmix*Mwmix));
908 
909  // Compute density and energy derivatives
910  const double drdt = dMwdT/Mwmix - 1.0/T; // note we leave out rho*(...)
911  const double drdp = dMwdP/Mwmix + 1.0/P; // here also
912 
913  return std::sqrt(cp / ((cp + (P/rho - dedp/drdp)*drdt) * rho * drdp));
914 }
915

918 void Thermodynamics::speciesHOverRT(
919  double* const h, double* const ht, double* const hr, double* const hv,
920  double* const hel, double* const hf) const
921 {
922  mp_thermodb->enthalpy(
923  mp_state->T(), mp_state->Te(), mp_state->Tr(), mp_state->Tv(),
924  mp_state->Tel(), h, ht, hr, hv, hel, hf);
925 }

932  T, T, T, T ,T, h, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
933 }

946 //==============================================================================
947 
948 double Thermodynamics::mixtureHMole() const
949 {
950  double h = 0.0;
951  speciesHOverRT(mp_work1);
952  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
953  h += mp_work1[i] * X()[i];
954  return (h * RU * mp_state->T());
955 }
956 
957 //==============================================================================
958 
959 double Thermodynamics::mixtureHMole(double T) const
960 {
961  double h = 0.0;
962  speciesHOverRT(T, mp_work1);
963  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
964  h += mp_work1[i] * X()[i];
965  return (h * RU * T);
966 }
967 
968 //==============================================================================
969 
970 double Thermodynamics::mixtureHMass() const
971 {
972  return mixtureHMole() / mixtureMw();
973 }
974 
975 //==============================================================================
976 
977 double Thermodynamics::mixtureHMass(double T) const
978 {
979  return mixtureHMole(T) / mixtureMw();
980 }
981 
982 //==============================================================================
983 
984 void Thermodynamics::speciesSOverR(double *const p_s) const
985 {
986  mp_thermodb->entropy(
987  mp_state->T(), mp_state->Te(), mp_state->Tr(), mp_state->Tv(),
988  mp_state->Tel(), standardStateP(), p_s, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
989 
990  double lnp = std::log(mp_state->P() / standardStateP());
991  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
992  if (species(i).phase() == GAS)
993  p_s[i] -= lnp;
994 }
995 
996 //==============================================================================
997 
998 double Thermodynamics::mixtureSMole() const
999 {
1000  double s = 0;
1001  speciesSOverR(mp_work1);
1002  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
1003  s += (X()[i] > 0.0 ? (mp_work1[i] - std::log(X()[i])) * X()[i] : 0.0);
1004  return (s * RU);
1005 }
1006 
1007 //==============================================================================
1008 
1009 double Thermodynamics::mixtureSMass() const {
1010  return mixtureSMole() / mixtureMw();
1011 }

1019  mp_state->Tel(), standardStateP(), p_g, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
1020 
1021  double lnp = std::log(mp_state->P() / standardStateP());
1022  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)
1023  if (species(i).phase() == GAS)
1024  p_g[i] += lnp;
1025 }

1032

1034  for (int i = 0; i < nSpecies(); ++i)

1047 
1048 void Thermodynamics::elementMoles(
1049  const double *const species_N, double *const element_N) const
1050 {
1051  Map<VectorXd>(element_N, nElements()) =
1052  Map<const VectorXd>(species_N, nSpecies()) * m_element_matrix;
1053 }
1054 
1055 //==============================================================================
1056 
1057 void Thermodynamics::elementFractions(
1058  const double* const Xs, double* const Xe) const
1059 {
1060 // RealVecWrapper wrapper(Xe, nElements());
1061 // wrapper = asVector(Xs, nSpecies()) * m_element_matrix;
1062 // double sum = wrapper.sum();
1063 // for (int i = 0; i < nElements(); ++i)
1064 // Xe[i] /= sum;
1065  //wrapper = wrapper / wrapper.sum();
1066 
1067  const int ne = nElements();
1068  const int ns = nSpecies();
1069 
1070  double temp = Xs[0];
1071  for (int k = 0; k < ne; ++k)
1072  Xe[k] = m_element_matrix(0,k)*temp;
1073 
1074  for (int i = 1; i < ns; ++i) {
1075  temp = Xs[i];
1076  for (int k = 0; k < ne; ++k)
1077  Xe[k] += m_element_matrix(i,k)*temp;
1078  }
1079 
1080  temp = 0.0;
1081  for (int k = 0; k < ne; ++k) {
1082  Xe[k] = std::max(0.0, Xe[k]);
1083  temp += Xe[k];
1084  }
1085 
1086  for (int k = 0; k < ne; ++k)
1087  Xe[k] /= temp;
1088 }
1089 
1090 //==============================================================================
1091 
1092 void Thermodynamics::surfaceMassBalance(
1093  const double *const p_Yke, const double *const p_Ykg, const double T,
1094  const double P, const double Bg, double &Bc, double &hw, double *const p_Xs)
1095 {
1096  const int ne = nElements();
1097  const int ng = nGas();
1098 
1099  double p_Xw [ne];
1100  double* p_X = (p_Xs != NULL ? p_Xs : mp_work1);
1101  double* p_h = mp_work2;
1102 
1103  // Initialize the wall element fractions to be the pyrolysis gas fractions
1104  double sum = 0.0;
1105  for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i) {
1106  p_Xw[i] = p_Yke[i] + Bg*p_Ykg[i];
1107  sum += p_Xw[i];
1108  }
1109 
1110  // Use "large" amount of carbon to simulate infinite char
1111  int ic = elementIndex("C");
1112  //double carbon = std::min(1000.0, std::max(100.0,1000.0*Bg));
1113  double carbon = std::max(100.0*Bg, 200.0);
1114  p_Xw[ic] += carbon;
1115  sum += carbon;
1116 
1117  for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i)
1118  p_Xw[i] /= sum;
1119 
1120  // Compute equilibrium
1121  convert<YE_TO_XE>(p_Xw, p_Xw);
1122  equilibriumComposition(T, P, p_Xw, p_X, IN_PHASE);
1123 
1124  // Compute the gas mass fractions at the wall
1125  double mwg = 0.0;
1126  double ywc = 0.0;
1127 
1128  for (int j = 0; j < ng; ++j) {
1129  mwg += speciesMw(j) * p_X[j];
1130  ywc += elementMatrix()(j,ic) * p_X[j];
1131  //for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i)
1132  // p_Yw[i] += elementMatrix()(j,i) * p_X[j];
1133  }
1134 
1135  //for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i)
1136  // p_Yw[i] *= atomicMass(i) / mwg;
1137  ywc *= atomicMass(ic) / mwg;
1138 
1139  // Compute char mass blowing rate
1140  Bc = (p_Yke[ic] + Bg*p_Ykg[ic] - ywc*(1.0 + Bg)) / (ywc - 1.0);
1141  Bc = std::max(Bc, 0.0);
1142 
1143  // Compute the gas enthalpy
1144  speciesHOverRT(T, p_h);
1145 
1146  hw = 0.0;
1147  for (int i = 0; i < ng; ++i)
1148  hw += p_X[i] * p_h[i];
1149  hw *= RU * T / mwg;
1150 }
1151 
1152 //==============================================================================
1153 
1154  } // namespace Thermodynamics
1155 } // namespace Mutation
